mapper.select: SELECT `AUTO_INCREMENT` FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'honey_badgers' AND TABLE_NAME = 'cart'
mapper.insert: insert into honey_badgers.cart (id, cust_id, quantity, unit_price, amount, kitchen_name, biz_name, menu_id, menu_name) values (#{id}, #{custId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{amount}, #{kitchenName}, #{bizName}, #{menuId}, #{menuName})
mapper.select: SELECT `AUTO_INCREMENT` FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'honey_badgers' AND TABLE_NAME = 'cart_detail'
mapper.insert: insert into honey_badgers.cart_detail (id, cart_id, menu_opt_id, menu_id, menu_opt_name, menu_opt_price) values (#{id}, #{cartId}, #{menuOptId}, #{menuId}, #{menuOptName}, #{menuOptPrice})
mapper.update: update honey_badgers.cart set quantity = #{quantity}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, amount = #{amount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from honey_badgers.cart where cust_id = #{custId}
